title: San Serif Font Identification
content:
I came across this sans font and thought it was avenir, but quickly realized the y was not avenir. Any suggetions as to what this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012144108im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Untitled2_4433.png)

author: Capnhud
